title: hmcl启动器,内存过大,开不了游戏
author: Jannes
txt_content:
问题如图,求求你,救救孩子吧

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
卸载原有的 java ，安装这个 https://download.mcbbs.net/java/jre_x64.exe

然后，在启动器中分配更多的内存

replies.author: Jannes
replies.txt_content:
